snippet: Time Warner may spin off most of Time Inc.'s magazines in a deal with Meredith Corporation; Panera Bread Bakeries is the latest company to appeal to consumers through good works; and discussions of the sounds and near-silence of "Life of Pi."
abstract: Time Warner may spin off most of Time Inc.'s magazines in a deal with Meredith Corporation; Panera Bread Bakeries is the latest company to appeal to consumers through good works; and discussions of the sounds and near-silence of "Life of Pi."

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Time Warner Considers Shedding Some Magazines and Panera Appeals to Consumers' Decency
